bio: Aayush is an AI Associate Developer at Insurity, quietly wiring AI copilots into day-to-day insurance tooling.
now: Rolling out dependable AI flows for policy operations at Insurity.
Documenting and handing off NetVR before its Oct 2025 sunset.
Grinding through ASU’s MCS Big Data Systems labs and capstones.
